But whether 'twas the coldness of the King, who looked full gently on his warlike queen, that robbed my soldiers of their heated spleen, or whether 'twas report of her success or more than common fear of Clifford's rigor, who thunders to his captives blood and death, cannot judge; but to conclude with truth, their weapons like to lightning came and went; our soldiers', like the night owl's lazy flight or like an idle thresher with a flail, fell gently down, as if they struck their friends.

Heaven has an end in all; yet, you that hear me, this from a dying man receive as certain: where you are liberal of your loves and counsels be sure you be not loose; for those you make friends and give your hearts to, when they once perceive the least rub in your fortunes, fall away like water from you, never found again but where they mean to sink you.
